#CLEAR
# DEFAULT.XCI for LK8000 by Paolo Ventafridda
# Release 4N , 110331
# 
# THIS FILE IS ENCODED IN UTF-8 WITH BOM
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE WITH AN ASCII EDITOR
# USE INSTEAD NOTEPAD++ WHICH IS FREE SOFTWARE
# 
# This is the default .XCI file configured internally.
# It controls all events from soft buttons and hardware keys.
# It is only a copy of what is internally used!
#
# If you want to change menu buttons and actions, remember to:
#     LEAVE at least two empty lines at the bottom of this file
#     Then enter Engineering menu in Config, and choose this file
#     inside the Event file selection. 
#     THEN restart LK.
# IF SOMETHING GOES BAD: remove the file or rename it.
# So it will not be loaded on startup, and the embedded will
# be used as usual.
# 
# Do NOT modify or remove the following line!
# LKXCI_VERSION=4
#
# Starting from version 4G, $(  will assume only 1 $( is there.
# If  &( is found, it is replaced with $( and we assume two $( are there.
# MAXIMUM 2 $() labels are allowed!
# -- Careful, degrees need unicode prefix, probably invisible if edited from MS
#
# -------------------
# GlideComputerEvents
# -------------------

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_START
event=Service TASKSTART

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_FINISH
event=Service TASKFINISH

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_NEXTWAYPOINT
event=Service TASKNEXTWAYPOINT

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_CONFIRMSTART
event=Service TASKCONFIRMSTART

mode=default
type=gce
data=ARM_READY
event=Beep 1
event=StatusMessage ZYX926

mode=default
type=gce
data=GPS_CONNECTION_WAIT
event=StatusMessage ZYX927

mode=default
type=gce
data=COMMPORT_RESTART
event=StatusMessage ZYX928

mode=default
type=gce
data=GPS_FIX_WAIT
event=StatusMessage ZYX929

mode=default
type=gce
data=STARTUP_SIMULATOR
event=TaskLoad Default.tsk

mode=default
type=gce
data=STARTUP_REAL
event=TaskLoad Default.tsk

mode=default
type=gce
data=TAKEOFF
event=AutoLogger start
event=StatusMessage ZYX930

mode=default
type=gce
data=LANDING
event=StatusMessage ZYX931
event=AutoLogger stop

mode=default
type=gce
data=FLIGHTMODE_FINALGLIDE_ABOVE
event=StatusMessage ZYX932

mode=default
type=gce
data=FLIGHTMODE_FINALGLIDE_BELOW
event=StatusMessage ZYX933

mode=default
type=gce
data=FLIGHTMODE_FINALGLIDE_TERRAIN
event=StatusMessage ZYX934


# ------------
# mode=default
# ------------

# clear main entry buttons


mode=default Display1 Display2 Display3 Config1 Config2 Config3 Info1 Info2 Bugs Ballast Wind pan Exit
type=key
data=APP1
label= 
location=1

mode=default Nav1 Nav2 Config1 Config2 Config3 Info1 Info2 Bugs Ballast Wind pan Exit
type=key
data=APP2
label= 
location=2

mode=default Nav1 Nav2 Display1 Display2 Display3 Info1 Info2 pan Exit
type=key
data=APP3
label= 
location=3

mode=default Nav1 Nav2 Display1 Display2 Display3 Config1 Config2 Config3 Bugs Ballast Wind pan Exit
type=key
data=APP4
label= 
location=4

mode=default
type=key
data=6
label= 
event=Null
location=5

mode=default
type=key
data=7
label= 
event=Null
location=6

mode=default
type=key
data=8
label= 
event=Null
location=7

mode=default
type=key
data=9
label= 
event=Null
location=8

mode=default
type=key
data=0
label= 
event=Null
location=9

###### pan mode ##########

### Hardware keys first

mode=pan
type=key
data=DOWN
event=Pan down

mode=pan
type=key
data=UP
event=Pan up

mode=pan
type=key
data=LEFT
event=Pan left

mode=pan
type=key
data=RIGHT
event=Pan right

### Soft buttons 

mode=pan
type=key
data=6
event=Zoom in
label=Zoom\n+
location=5

mode=pan
type=key
data=7
event=Zoom out
label=Zoom\n-
location=6

mode=pan
type=key
data=8
event=NearestWaypointDetails pan
label=Najbliższy\nPZ
location=7

mode=pan
type=key
data=9
event=Pan supertoggle
label=Przesuw.\n$(PanModeStatus)
location=8

mode=pan
type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
label=Pełny\nEkran 
location=9

#
# These are the hardware keys pressed anytime
#
# Buttons ..

mode=default
type=key
data=APP1
event=Mode Nav1
label= 
location=1

mode=default
type=key
data=APP2
event=Mode Info1
label= 
location=2

mode=default
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config1
label= 
location=3

mode=default
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode Display1
label= 
location=4

# Jog, wheel, rocker etc.
# Scroll wheel for HP31X doesn't have left and right,
# but a long press produces an ESCAPE keycode

mode=default
type=key
data=DOWN
event=Zoom out

mode=default
type=key
data=UP
event=Zoom in

mode=default
type=key
data=RETURN
event=ScreenModes toggle

mode=default
type=key
data=LEFT
event=MarkLocation

mode=default
type=key
data=RIGHT
event=ScreenModes toggle

mode=default
type=key
data=ESCAPE
event=VisualGlide show
event=VisualGlide toggle

# mode=infobox
# ------------
#
# Do not modify these settings

mode=infobox
type=key
data=APP1
event=Null 
label= 
location=1

mode=infobox
type=key
data=APP2
event=Null 
label= 
location=2

mode=infobox
type=key
data=APP3
event=Null 
label= 
location=3

mode=infobox
type=key
data=APP4
event=Null 
label= 
location=4

mode=infobox
type=key
data=UP
event=DoInfoKey up

mode=infobox
type=key
data=DOWN
event=DoInfoKey down

mode=infobox
type=key
data=LEFT
event=DoInfoKey left

mode=infobox
type=key
data=RIGHT
event=DoInfoKey right

mode=infobox
type=key
data=RETURN
event=DoInfoKey return

mode=infobox
type=key
data=6
label= 
location=5

mode=infobox
type=key
data=7
label= 
location=6

mode=infobox
type=key
data=8
label= 
location=7

mode=infobox
type=key
data=9
label= 
location=8

mode=infobox
type=key
data=0
label= 
location=9

# mode=Nav1
# -------------

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=APP1
event=Mode Nav2
label=Naw\n1/3
location=1

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=APP2
event=Mode default
label=Anuluj
location=2

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Menu
label=Powrót
location=3

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode SIMMENU
label=SIM\nMENU$(SIMONLY)
location=4

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=6
event=Calculator
event=Mode default
label=Kalkulat.\nZadania$(CheckTask)
location=5

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=7
event=ArmAdvance show
event=ArmAdvance toggle
event=Mode default
label=$(CheckTask)Uzbrój PZ\n&(AdvanceArmed)
location=6

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=8
event=AdjustWaypoint previous
label=$(WaypointPrevious)
location=7

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=9
event=AdjustWaypoint next
label=$(WaypointNext)
location=8

mode=Nav1
type=key
data=0
event=WaypointDetails select
event=Mode default
label=Lista\nPZ
location=9

event=UserDisplayModeForce forcecruise
label=Tryb\n$(DispModeCruiseShortIndicator)Przelot&(DispModeCruiseShortIndicator)

label=Tryb\n$(DispModeFinalShortIndicator)Dolot&(DispModeFinalShortIndicator)

# mode=Config1
# -------------

mode=Config1
type=key
data=APP1
event=Service LOCKMODE
event=Mode default
label=$(LOCKMODE)
location=1

mode=Config1
type=key
data=APP2
event=Mode Menu
label=Powrót
location=2

mode=Config1
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config2
label=Konfig\n1/3
location=3

mode=Config1
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode default
label=Anuluj
location=4

mode=Config1
type=key
data=6
event=Setup Basic
event=Mode default
label=Ustaw.\nPodst.
location=5

mode=Config1
type=key
data=7
event=Setup Wind
event=Mode default
label=Ustaw\nWiatr
location=6

mode=Config1
type=key
data=8
event=Mode default
event=ActiveMap show
event=ActiveMap toggle
label=Akt. Map.\n$(ActiveMap)
location=7

mode=Config1
type=key
data=9
event=AirspaceDisplayMode toggle
label=Strefy\n$(AirspaceMode)
location=8

type=key
data=0
event=BaroAltitude show
event=BaroAltitude toggle
event=Mode default

# ----------------------------------------------------------
# mode=Menu 
#
# This is the menu appearing when you click on bottom right corner
# over the aircraft icon.
# Do not remove the EXIT button on location 9!
# ----------------------------------------------------------

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP1
event=Mode Nav1
label=Naw
location=1

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP2
event=Mode Info1
label=Info
location=2

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config1
label=Konfig
location=3

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode Display1
label=Ekran
location=4

mode=Menu
type=key
data=6
event=Exit system
event=Mode default
label=Wyjście
location=5

mode=Menu
type=key
data=7
event=Mode TrueWind
label=Oblicz\nTrueWind
location=6

mode=Menu
type=key
data=8
event=Mode MC
label=MC ($(MacCreadyMode))\n&(MacCreadyValue)
location=7

mode=Menu
type=key
data=9
event=Mode ScreenMode
label=Ustaw.\nEkranu
location=8

mode=Menu
type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
label=Anuluj
location=9

type=key
data=6
event=MacCready 5down
label=MC\n-0.5
location=5

mode=MC
type=key
data=7
event=MacCready down
label=MC\n-0.1
location=6

mode=MC
type=key
data=8
event=MacCready up
label=MC\n+0.1
location=7

mode=MC
type=key
data=9
event=MacCready 5up
label=MC\n+0.5
location=8

mode=MC
type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
label=OK\n$(MacCreadyValue)
location=9

# mode=ScreenMode
# -------------

label=Zoom\n-

event=Pan supertoggle
label=Przesuw.\n$(PanModeStatus)
location=8

mode=ScreenMode
type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
event=ScreenModes togglefull
label=IBOX\n$(FullScreenToggleActionName)
location=9

# -------------
# mode=Orientation
# -------------

type=key
data=APP1
label=
location=1

mode=Orientation
type=key
data=APP2
label=
location=2

mode=Orientation
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Display3
label=Powrót
location=3

mode=Orientation
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode default
label=Anuluj
location=4

mode=Orientation
type=key
data=6
event=Orientation northup
label=North\nup
location=5

mode=Orientation
type=key
data=7
event=Orientation trackup
label=Track\nup
location=6

mode=Orientation
type=key
data=8
event=Orientation northcircle
label=North\ncircle
location=7

mode=Orientation
type=key

event=Orientation trackcircle
label=Target\ncircle
location=8

type=key
data=0
event=Orientation northsmart
label=North\nsmart
location=9

# -------------
# mode=SetupFlarm
# -------------

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=APP1
event=SendNMEAPort1 PFLAR,0
label=REBOOT\nFLARM
location=1

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=APP2
event=SendNMEAPort1 PFLAC,S,NMEAOUT,1
label=Normal.\nNMEA
location=2

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config3
label=Powrót
location=3

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode default
label=Anuluj
location=4

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=6
event=SendNMEAPort1 PFLAC,S,CFLAGS,0
label=Normalne\nFlagi
location=5

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=7
event=Mode FlarmSpeed
label=Prędkość
location=6

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=8
event=Mode FlarmSig
label=Diody i\nDźwięki
location=7

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=9
event=Mode FlarmStealth
label=Tryby\nStealth
location=8

mode=SetupFlarm
type=key
data=0
event=Mode FlarmRange
label=Zasięg\nRadia
location=9

# -------------
# mode=Profile
# -------------

mode=Profile
type=key
data=APP1
event=ProfileLoad PROFILE3.prf
label=Load\nProfile3
location=1

mode=Profile
type=key
data=APP2
event=ProfileSave PROFILE3.prf
label=Save\nProfile3
location=2

mode=Profile
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config3
label=Back
location=3

mode=Profile
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode default
label=Cancel
location=4

mode=Profile
type=key
data=6
event=ProfileLoad PROFILE1.prf
label=Load\nProfile1
location=5

mode=Profile
type=key
data=7
event=ProfileSave PROFILE1.prf
label=Save\nProfile1
location=6

mode=Profile
type=key
data=8
event=ProfileLoad PROFILE2.prf
label=Load\nProfile2
location=7

mode=Profile
type=key
data=9
event=ProfileSave PROFILE2.prf
label=Save\nProfile2
location=8

mode=Profile
type=key
data=0
event=ProfileLoad Factory
label=Reset\nFactory$(DISABLED)
location=9

type=key
data=APP1
label=

type=key
data=APP2
event=ChangeMultitarget FLARM
event=Mode default
label=$(CheckFLARM)F>\nFLARM
location=2

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=APP3
event=ChangeMultitarget MATE
event=Mode default
label=Z>\nZespół
location=3

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=APP4
event=ChangeMultitarget THER
event=Mode default
label=K>\nKomin
location=4

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=6
event=ChangeMultitarget TASK
event=Mode default
label=P>\nPZ
location=5

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=7
event=ChangeMultitarget BALT
event=Mode default
label=N>\nNajlepsze
location=6

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=8
event=ChangeMultitarget ALT1
event=Mode default
label=1>\nAltern. 1
location=7

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=9
event=ChangeMultitarget ALT2
event=Mode default
label=2>\nAltern. 2
location=8

mode=MTarget
type=key
data=0
event=ChangeMultitarget HOME
event=Mode default
label=D>\nDom
location=9
